column1: betty norman| betty norman (bethel lillian bergquist) betty norman passed away of natural causes april 27
column2: 2015. she is survived by her daughter kelly (norman) campbell
column10: who she enjoyed very much. a celebration of her life will take place saturday
column12: 2014 from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm at her home in phoenix
column13: 2021 w. earl drive. betty was baptized at st. gregorys catholic church
column14: so this will be a celebration of her graduation into the heavalies. praise jesus
